Certification_Reference_Certification_ID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Certification_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Country_Reference_ISO_3166-1_Alpha-2_Cod.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Country_Reference_ISO_3166-1_Alpha-3_Cod.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Country_Reference_ISO_3166-1_Numeric-3_C.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Country_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Inactive.description: Indicates whether or not this certification is active in the system and is available for users to choose from prompts.

Issuer_Reference_Certification_Issuer_ID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Issuer_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Name.description: The name or type of the certification.

Restrict_Specialty_to_Certification.description: When selected, the specialty prompt displayed to workers adding certifications to their worker profile will be restricted to the mapped specialties.

Restrict_to_Country_Region_Reference.description: The state or province in which the certification is issued.

Specialty_Reference.description: Any specialties which are recommended for this certification.

Track_Exam_Date_and_Score.description: Indicates whether or not the worker holding this certification may have the exam date and score fields enabled.

Usage_Count.description: The number of records in the system that refers to this certification.
